entities.name: UNIVERSITY
entities.description: An educational institution that provides higher education and research opportunities. The company hires a mix of university talent worldwide.

entities.name: INDUSTRY
entities.description: A sector of the economy that provides goods or services. The company hires a mix of industry talent worldwide.

relationships.relationship_description: The company hires a mix of talent from both universities and industries worldwide, indicating a collaboration or mutual influence between educational institutions and economic sectors.
